values.title: Making a Positive Impact
values.description: I design products that are useful, inclusive, and meaningful. Even small changes should make life easier.

values.title: Curiosity & Iteration
values.description: I ask “what if?” and iterate quickly, using data where it matters to solve tough problems.

values.title: Collaboration & Versatility
values.description: I love working with others — from government to startups and SaaS — and adapt quickly to new challenges.

values.title: Designing with Care
values.description: Details matter. A smooth flow, clear system, or consistent interface can transform the experience.

values.title: Balancing Creativity & Logic
values.description: I combine bold ideas with solid foundations to create products that are beautiful, functional, and built to last.

values.title: Lifelong Learning
values.description: I’m always learning new approaches, tools, and frameworks — staying curious keeps my work fresh.
